# @paxeer/paxeer-connect

> TypeScript SDK for Paxeer Smart Wallet system â€“ WalletFactory, EventEmitter, SSORegistry

This is a TypeScript SDK for interacting with EVM smart contracts.
It provides typed ABIs, React/Wagmi hooks, non-React actions, contract constants,
and a Graph Protocol subgraph for indexing.

## Tech Stack
- TypeScript 5.3+
- wagmi v2 (React hooks)
- viem v2 (low-level Ethereum interface)
- Graph Protocol (subgraph indexing)

## Networks
  - Paxeer Network (chainId: 125, rpc: https://public-rpc.paxeer.app/rpc)

## Contracts

  ## EventEmitter
  Addresses: paxeer-network=0x5fF05F82928C9f742AAF8Ac03dBEFbeaDC493a58

  ### Read Functions
    - factory()
    - isRegisteredWallet(wallet: address)
    - owner()
    - paused()
    - totalTransactions()
    - walletOwnerOf(wallet: address)

  ### Write Functions
    - deregisterWallet(wallet: address)
    - emitTransaction(to: address, value: uint256, data: bytes, txNonce: uint256, success: bool, returnData: bytes)
    - pause()
    - registerWallet(wallet: address, walletOwner: address)
    - renounceOwnership()
    - setFactory(_factory: address)
    - transferOwnership(newOwner: address)
    - unpause()

  ### Events
    - OwnershipTransferred(indexed previousOwner: address, indexed newOwner: address)
    - Paused(account: address)
    - TransactionExecuted(indexed wallet: address, indexed to: address, value: uint256, data: bytes, nonce: uint256, timestamp: uint256, success: bool, returnData: bytes)
    - Unpaused(account: address)
    - WalletDeregistered(indexed wallet: address)
    - WalletRegistered(indexed wallet: address, indexed owner: address)

  ## WalletFactory
  Addresses: paxeer-network=0xec0f990c01a3571259Be6183Ec8ED25a0aC67AD6

  ### Read Functions
    - eventEmitter()
    - getWallet(owner_: address)
    - implementation()
    - isWallet(wallet: address)
    - owner()
    - paused()
    - predictWalletAddress(owner_: address, salt: bytes32)
    - ssoRegistry()
    - totalWallets()
    - unassignedWalletAt(index: uint256)
    - unassignedWalletCount()

  ### Write Functions
    - assignWallet(wallet: address, newOwner: address)
    - createWallet(owner_: address)
    - createWalletWithSalt(owner_: address, salt: bytes32)
    - deployWallets(count: uint256)
    - pause()
    - renounceOwnership()
    - setEventEmitter(newEventEmitter: address)
    - setImplementation(newImplementation: address)
    - setSSORegistry(newSSORegistry: address)
    - transferOwnership(newOwner: address)
    - unpause()

  ### Events
    - OwnershipTransferred(indexed previousOwner: address, indexed newOwner: address)
    - Paused(account: address)
    - Unpaused(account: address)
    - WalletAssigned(indexed wallet: address, indexed owner: address)
    - WalletCreated(indexed owner: address, indexed wallet: address, salt: bytes32)
    - WalletPreDeployed(indexed wallet: address, index: uint256)

  ## SSORegistry
  Addresses: paxeer-network=0x6cf9392abc7947Dbc9289Fd1F65c4a4B9d423332

  ### Read Functions
    - MAX_KEYS_PER_WALLET()
    - MAX_SESSION_DURATION()
    - PERMISSION_ALL()
    - PERMISSION_CALL_CONTRACT()
    - PERMISSION_EXECUTE()
    - PERMISSION_EXECUTE_BATCH()
    - PERMISSION_TRANSFER_ERC20()
    - PERMISSION_TRANSFER_ETH()
    - authorizedCallers(arg0: address)
    - getActiveSigners(wallet: address)
    - getSessionKey(wallet: address, signer: address)
    - owner()
    - validateSessionKey(wallet: address, signer: address, requiredPermissions: uint256)

  ### Write Functions
    - registerSessionKey(signer: address, validAfter: uint48, validUntil: uint48, permissions: uint256)
    - registerSessionKeyFor(wallet: address, signer: address, validAfter: uint48, validUntil: uint48, permissions: uint256)
    - renounceOwnership()
    - revokeSessionKey(signer: address)
    - revokeSessionKeyFor(wallet: address, signer: address)
    - setAuthorizedCaller(caller: address, authorized: bool)
    - transferOwnership(newOwner: address)

  ### Events
    - OwnershipTransferred(indexed previousOwner: address, indexed newOwner: address)
    - SessionKeyRegistered(indexed wallet: address, indexed signer: address, validAfter: uint48, validUntil: uint48, permissions: uint256)
    - SessionKeyRevoked(indexed wallet: address, indexed signer: address)
    - SessionKeyUpdated(indexed wallet: address, indexed signer: address, validUntil: uint48, permissions: uint256)

  ## SmartWallet
  Addresses: paxeer-network=0x444490870B799544d841625E7a040b41F17FCe21

  ### Read Functions
    - DOMAIN_SEPARATOR()
    - DOMAIN_TYPEHASH()
    - EXECUTE_TYPEHASH()
    - eventEmitter()
    - factory()
    - getBalance()
    - getMetadata()
    - getNonce()
    - getTokenBalance(token: address)
    - getTransaction(txNonce: uint256)
    - isAssigned()
    - paused()
    - ssoRegistry()
    - walletOwner()

  ### Write Functions
    - assignOwner(newOwner: address)
    - execute(to: address, value: uint256, data: bytes)
    - executeBatch(targets: address[], values: uint256[], datas: bytes[])
    - executeWithSignature(to: address, value: uint256, data: bytes, deadline: uint256, signature: bytes)
    - initialize(owner_: address, eventEmitter_: address, ssoRegistry_: address)
    - pause()
    - setMetadata(metadata_: tuple)
    - transferOwnership(newOwner: address)
    - unpause()

  ### Events
    - BatchExecuted(count: uint256, startNonce: uint256)
    - Executed(indexed to: address, value: uint256, nonce: uint256, success: bool)
    - MetadataUpdated(argusId: string, indexed onchainId: address, userAlias: string)
    - OwnerAssigned(indexed owner: address)
    - Paused(account: address)
    - Received(indexed from: address, value: uint256)
    - SessionKeyAuthorized(indexed signer: address)
    - SessionKeyRevoked(indexed signer: address)
    - Unpaused(account: address)

## Module Structure
- src/abis/        Typed ABI exports (as const)
- src/types/       TypeScript interfaces
- src/hooks/       React hooks (useRead*, useWrite*, useSimulate*, useWatch*)
- src/actions/     Non-React contract actions
- src/constants/   Addresses, chain configs, RPC URLs
- subgraph/        Graph Protocol subgraph
- docs/            Markdown API docs
